DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study psychometric validation two questionnaire ( PISQ-R new questionnaire sexuality ) compare non specific questionnaire female sexual function ( FSFI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Psychometric Validation French Version PISQ-R New Questionnaire About Sexuality
DOC.criteria: Patient pregnant Patient read understand French The patient must give inform sign consent The patient must insure beneficiary health insurance plan The patient genital prolapse and/or urinary incontinence and/or anal incontinence , undergone surgery The patient judicial protection The patient understand french Patient vulvodynia Patient painful bladder syndrome The patient chronic pelvic pain longer 6 month
